title: Star Force: Disarmament
description: With the brunt of the Chinese attack repelled, Star Force pushes into the enemy's Lunar territories, intent on ending the brief war by expelling the attackers from the moon entirely. Meanwhile the naval conflict escalates, with the Chinese fleet still running dark and unaccounted for. "Disarmament" is the 10th episode in the series.Word Count: 25,500
author: Aer-ki Jyr
